00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : CollisionG
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00028 
00029  SUBROUTINE CollisionG
00030 
00031 ! Common Variables
00032  USE NTypes,    ONLY : DBL
00033  USE Domain,    ONLY : ni, now, nxt, xl, xu, yl, yu
00034  USE FluidParams
00035  USE LBMParams
00036  IMPLICIT NONE
00037 
00038 ! Local Variables
00039  INTEGER :: i, j, ie, iw, jn, js, xs, ys
00040  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: sFx, sFy, iFs
00041  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Vg, Vsq, Vg2, ux, uy
00042  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: rhon, invrho, phin, phin2, muPhi
00043  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradPhiX, gradPhiY, gradPhiSq, lapPhi
00044  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Ag0, Ag1, Eg0A, Eg1A, Eg2A, Eg0R, Eg1R, Eg2R, geq
00045 
00046 
00047 !---------- Hydrodynamics, collision and stream for g in the same loop ---------
00048  DO j = yl, yu
00049    DO i = xl, xu
00050 
00051 ! Define near neighbors for the streaming step
00052      ie = ni(i,j,1)
00053      jn = ni(i,j,2)
00054      iw = ni(i,j,3)
00055      js = ni(i,j,4)
00056 
00057 ! Define source nodes in the order parameter mesh
00058      xs = 2*i - 1
00059      ys = 2*j - 1
00060 
00061 ! Copy and re-scale the values of the order parameter and its differentials
00062      phin      = phi_f(xs,ys)
00063      phin2     = phin*phin
00064      lapPhi    = 4.D0*lapPhi_f(xs,ys)
00065      gradPhiX  = 2.D0*gradPhiX_f(xs,ys)
00066      gradPhiY  = 2.D0*gradPhiY_f(xs,ys)
00067      gradPhiSq = gradPhiX*gradPhiX + gradPhiY*gradPhiY
00068 
00069 ! Local value of the chemical potential
00070      muPhi = alpha4*phin*( phin2 - phistar2 ) - kappaG*lapPhi
00071 
00072 !---------- Hydrodynamics ------------------------------------------------------
00073 !  Local density value
00074      rhon   = g(i,j,0,now) + g(i,j,1,now) + g(i,j,2,now) + g(i,j,3,now) &
00075             + g(i,j,4,now) + g(i,j,5,now) + g(i,j,6,now) + g(i,j,7,now) &
00076             + g(i,j,8,now)
00077      invRho = 1.D0/rhon
00078 
00079 ! Interfacial force
00080      sFx = muPhi*gradPhiX
00081      sFy = muPhi*gradPhiY
00082 
00083 ! Velocity field at each node
00084      ux = ( g(i,j,1,now) - g(i,j,3,now) + g(i,j,5,now) - g(i,j,6,now) &
00085         - g(i,j,7,now) + g(i,j,8,now) + 0.5D0*sFx )*invRho
00086 
00087      uy = ( g(i,j,2,now) - g(i,j,4,now) + g(i,j,5,now) + g(i,j,6,now) &
00088         - g(i,j,7,now) - g(i,j,8,now) + 0.5D0*sFy )*invRho
00089 
00090      u(i,j,1) = ux
00091      u(i,j,2) = uy
00092 
00093 ! Pressure at each node
00094      p(i,j) = alpha*( phin2*( 3.D0*phin2 - 2.D0*phiStar2 ) - phiStar4 ) &
00095             - kappaG*( phin*lapPhi + 0.5D0*gradPhiSq ) + Cs_sq*rhon
00096 
00097 !---------- Collision and Stream for momentum distribution function ------------
00098      Ag1 = rhon + 3.D0*phin*muPhi
00099      Ag0 = 2.25D0*rhon - 1.25D0*Ag1
00100      Eg0A = Eg0*Ag0
00101      Eg1A = Eg1*Ag1
00102      Eg2A = Eg2*Ag1
00103      Eg0R = Eg0C*rhon
00104      Eg1R = Eg1C*rhon
00105      Eg2R = Eg2C*rhon
00106      Vsq  = 0.5D0*( ux*ux + uy*uy )
00107 
00108 ! Direction 0
00109      geq = Eg0A - Eg0R*Vsq
00110      iFs = Eg0T*( -ux*sFx - uy*sFy )
00111      g(i,j,0,nxt) = g(i,j,0,now) + invTauRho*( geq - g(i,j,0,now) ) + iFs
00112 
00113 ! Direction 1
00114      geq = Eg1A + Eg1R*( ux + 1.5D0*ux*ux - Vsq )
00115      iFs = Eg1T*( (1.D0 + 2.D0*ux)*sFx - uy*sFy )
00116      g(ie,j,1,nxt) = g(i,j,1,now) + invTauRho*( geq - g(i,j,1,now) ) + iFs
00117 
00118 ! Direction 2
00119      geq = Eg1A + Eg1R*( uy + 1.5D0*uy*uy - Vsq )
00120      iFs = Eg1T*( -ux*sFx + (1.D0 + 2.D0*uy)*sFy )
00121      g(i,jn,2,nxt) = g(i,j,2,now) + invTauRho*( geq - g(i,j,2,now) ) + iFs
00122 
00123 ! Direction 3
00124      geq = Eg1A + Eg1R*( -ux + 1.5D0*ux*ux - Vsq )
00125      iFs = Eg1T*( (2.D0*ux - 1.D0)*sFx - uy*sFy )
00126      g(iw,j,3,nxt) = g(i,j,3,now) + invTauRho*( geq - g(i,j,3,now) ) + iFs
00127 
00128 ! Direction 4
00129      geq = Eg1A + Eg1R*( -uy + 1.5D0*uy*uy - Vsq )
00130      iFs = Eg1T*( -ux*sFx + (2.D0*uy - 1)*sFy )
00131      g(i,js,4,nxt) = g(i,j,4,now) + invTauRho*( geq - g(i,j,4,now) ) + iFs
00132 
00133 ! Direction 5
00134      Vg = ux + uy
00135      Vg2 = invCs_sq*Vg
00136      geq = Eg2A + Eg2R*( Vg + 1.5D0*Vg*Vg - Vsq )
00137      iFs = Eg2T*( ( (1.D0 - ux) + Vg2 )*sFx + ( (1.D0 - uy) + Vg2 )*sFy )
00138      g(ie,jn,5,nxt) = g(i,j,5,now) + invTauRho*( geq - g(i,j,5,now) ) + iFs
00139 
00140 ! Direction 6
00141      Vg = -ux + uy
00142      Vg2 = invCs_sq*Vg
00143      geq = Eg2A + Eg2R*( Vg + 1.5D0*Vg*Vg - Vsq )
00144      iFs = Eg2T*( ( (-1.D0 - ux) - Vg2 )*sFx + ( (1.D0 - uy) + Vg2 )*sFy )
00145      g(iw,jn,6,nxt) = g(i,j,6,now) + invTauRho*( geq - g(i,j,6,now) ) + iFs
00146 
00147 ! Direction 7
00148      Vg = -ux - uy
00149      Vg2 = invCs_sq*Vg
00150      geq = Eg2A + Eg2R*( Vg + 1.5D0*Vg*Vg - Vsq )
00151      iFs = Eg2T*( ( (-1.D0 - ux) - Vg2 )*sFx + ( (-1.D0 - uy) - Vg2 )*sFy )
00152      g(iw,js,7,nxt) = g(i,j,7,now) + invTauRho*( geq - g(i,j,7,now) ) + iFs
00153 
00154 ! Direction 8
00155      Vg = ux - uy
00156      Vg2 = invCs_sq*Vg
00157      geq = Eg2A + Eg2R*( Vg + 1.5D0*Vg*Vg - Vsq )
00158      iFs = Eg2T*( ( (1.D0 - ux) + Vg2 )*sFx + ( (-1.D0 - uy) - Vg2 )*sFy)
00159      g(ie,js,8,nxt) = g(i,j,8,now) + invTauRho*( geq - g(i,j,8,now) ) + iFs
00160 
00161    END DO
00162  END DO
00163 
00164  RETURN
00165  END SUBROUTINE CollisionG
00166
